2083.subject: HCOM
2083.descrlong: Prepares students to write news articles for the mass media. Outcomes include learning basic concepts of journalistic interviewing; information gathering; critical understanding of new sources; ethical decision making; and writing news, editorial, and feature articles for print and electronic media. Students working on the Otter Realm are strongly encouraged to enroll. Offers built-in assessment in HCOM MLO 2 or the concentrations in Journalism and Media Studies or Writing and Rhetoric. Requires successful completion of the ENGCOM ULR. (Offered every year.)
